text: As a nation, we must push each other to stand true to the ideals of our democracy and stand steadfast against hate. #LGBTQ+ #PrideMonth

I want to wish everyone a Happy Pride Month! 

I will continue to do everything in my power to defend the rights and liberties that make us American, including the right to love who you love and identify as who you are. https://t.co/9wcvtXPyIf

As we enter the month of June and Gun Violence Awareness Month, we continue to be reminded of the devastating harm the epidemic of gun violence has on our nation.
